help-file.title: ILLUSIONIST
help-file.content:
Illusionist are the magical masters of the unreal and the shadow. They are capable of illusions so powerful no one can help but believe they are real. They are also masters of deception and many have foolishly let them into their ranks, to their doom. Illusionist tend to be highly intelligent and use this to their advantage.
Allowable races: Human, Gnome, Halfling, Goblin, Orc, Phantom, Lich. Equipment usage: Like all classes on Duris, Illusionist have their own specific item restrictions. They have a very small range of weapons they can use and a small range of armor to choose from. They have very little restrictions on what miscellaneous magical items they can use, though.
